articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Marked
Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Sunday devotes an article to the 14th anniversary of the publication of leader Kim Jong Il's work "The Songun-Based Revolutionary Line Is a Great Revolutionary Line of Our Era and an Ever-Victorious Banner of Our Revolution".
					The work published on January 29, Juche 92 (2003) serves as an monumental document which comprehensively deals with the essential character and revolutionary nature of the Workers' Party of Korea's line of the Songun revolution, Songun politics, its validity and invincibility, and important guidelines clearly indicating tasks and ways for hastening the final victory of the Juche revolution under the banner of Songun.
					
					Recalling that more than a decade has passed since the work was published, the article goes on:
					
					During the period the service personnel and people of the DPRK have deeply grasped the truth that Songun is the banner for winning one victory after another and the prosperity of the country and happiness of the generations to come can be achieved only through the Songun politics.
					
					Leader Kim Jong Il always took the lead in making journeys along steep mountain roads leading to the forefront, sailing despite stormy waves and weathering snowstorm in the northern areas of the country with the firm faith that armed forces guarantee victory of socialism and prosperity of the country and the nation. Our people will never forget his high-intensity forced march made with ardent patriotism and devotion. It was thanks to the total dedication of the peerlessly great man that the dignity and national power of the DPRK were put on the highest level, the grand march was made to reach the world level and the June 15 era of reunification and the history of great victory in the nuclear standoff with the U.S. were opened. 
					
					Kim Jong Il honorably protected socialism of Juche and gave steady continuity to the lineage of the Korean revolution by pursuing the Songun politics in the rigorous period when the destiny of the country and the nation was at the crossroads of rise and fall. These precious feats will always go down in the history of the country.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts S. Korea-U.S. "Mutual Defense and Assistance Agreement"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts S. Korea-U.S. "Mutual Defense and Assistance Agreement"
 Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- 67 years have passed since the U.S. cooked up the "Mutual Defense and Assistance Agreement" for aggression with traitor Syngman Rhee on January 26, 1950 under the signboard of "defense" and "assistance", says Rodong Sinmun Sunday in an article.
					 The "agreement" is a product of the U.S. brigandish aggressive scenario to strengthen military domination and subjugation of south Korea under the signboard of "alliance" and realize its wild ambition for invading the DPRK, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The "agreement" granted the U.S. limitless rights to deploy its aggressor forces and set up military bases anywhere in south Korea while oppressing and exploiting its people. Contrary to this, it obliged the south Korean authorities to meekly meet any U.S. brigandish demand.
					
					 The "agreement" helped the U.S. dramatically bolster up south Korean puppet forces' capability to attack the north. Pursuant to the already worked out scenario, the U.S. instigated traitor Syngman Rhee to ignite a war of aggression against the DPRK on June 25, 1950.
					
					 The last Korean War clearly showed what grave consequences were caused by the criminal scenario pursued by the U.S. to dominate the whole of Korea after signing the above-said "agreement." 
					
					 The moves escalated by the U.S. and its lackeys to stifle the DPRK would only prompt the latter to bolster up its capability for self-defence and for preemptive attack with nuclear force as its pivot.

articles.title: Traitorous Policy of South Korean Conservative Group Bound to Totally Go Bust: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Traitorous Policy of South Korean Conservative Group Bound to Totally Go Bust: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- The traitorous policy of the puppet conservative regime is the source of misfortune and pain of south Korean people, says Rodong Sinmun on Sunday in an article. 
					 It goes on:
					
					 The traitorous policy of traitor Park Geun Hye in south Korea is regarded as an unacceptable policy as it goes against the will and wishes of the people.
					
					 It is the puppet conservative group that has savagely trampled down the desire of the people for independence, democracy and reunification by persistently pursuing an unpopular rule in utter disregard of the public mindset.
					
					 As proven by "Park Geun Hye-Choe Sun Sil scandal," this group of villains denied the people even an elementary right to existence, not content with treating them as dogs and pigs while wallowing in luxury and glory dependent on big businesses.
					
					 The traitorous policy of the Park Geun Hye group deserves the criticism and rebuff of the people as it tramples down the will and interests of the people.
					
					 The none of the south Korean people will allow the repetition of traitorous policy of the conservative group as they are disillusioned with the four-year office of Park Geun Hye. People took to streets with candlelight in hands in protest against her to put an end to her traitorous policy, the root cause of all sorts of misfortune and pain, and bring about new politics.
					
					 It is the only way of realizing the wishes of the participants of candle-light actions in south Korea to wage a resolute struggle to put a definite end to the traitorous policy of the conservative group.
					
					 People's demand represents the divine will. The traitorous policy of the conservative group is bound to go totally bust.
					
					 The south Korean candlelight holders will never pardon the conservative group keen on sycophancy and treachery, confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north and fascist dictatorial rule.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Flays S. Korean Puppet Prime Minister's Reckless Remarks
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Flays S. Korean Puppet Prime Minister's Reckless Remarks 
 Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- Hwang Kyo An, puppet acting president, at a recent "press conference on the new year" again incited confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north. He cried out for "building a strong security posture to cope with north's provocation" and "pressurizing the north to dismantle its nukes" through the "all-round sanctions against the north".
					 Rodong Sinmun Sunday observes in a commentary:
					
					 What he uttered is nothing but revelation of his intention to further intensify the moves for a war against the north in league with his American master under the pretext of the "security crisis".
					
					 Absolutely unpardonable is the scenario of the puppet group of traitors to escalate confrontation and tension between the north and the south while groundlessly slandering the fellow countrymen in the north under the pretext of "provocation" and "threat" and throwing a wet blanket over the ardent desire of the compatriots for reunification under the pretext of the "security crisis" in a bid to prolong their remaining days and realize the ambition for invading the north.
					
					 It is natural for the south Korean people to stage candlelight actions bitterly condemning Hwang Kyo An and his group for driving the inter-Korean relations into a more catastrophic phase in lieu of opting for rolling back traitor Park Geun Hye's policy of confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 The puppet group of traitors can never get rid of the abyss of ruin with such poor burlesque of trumpeting about "security crisis".
					
					 Hwang is fated to be buried in the cemetery of history along with Park. He, therefore, had better stop talking nonsense and step down as demanded by the south Korean people.

articles.title: Minju Joson Brands Hong Yong Phyo as Confrontation Maniac, Bete Noire
articles.content:
Minju Joson Brands Hong Yong Phyo as Confrontation Maniac, Bete Noire
 Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- Traitor Hong Yong Phyo, puppet minister of Unification of south Korea, at a recent "plenary meeting of the Policy Advisory Committee" zealously supported traitor Park Geun Hye's policy of confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north while vociferating about "confidence-building process" and "denuclearization of the north". Hong went the lengths of talking about "consistency of policy", "change in the north", "human rights" and "people's living".
					 Minju Joson Sunday in a commentary terms this a blatant challenge to the desire of all Koreans for the improved inter-Korean relations and the reunification of the country.
					
					 Branding Hong as a confrontation maniac and bete noire who has committed all sorts of crimes against the people, nation and reunification as a special-class confident of Park, the commentary goes on:
					
					 It is the demand of the south Korean people that Hong be ousted from the post of the minister of Unification at once. Had he have an elementary sense and consciousness, he should have already chosen his way, heeding the voices of the people.
					
					 However, what he learned is just flattery and greed for power and he is as impudent as Park. That is why he is still going so shameless as to blare the worn-out trumpet about confrontation.
					
					 He is, no doubt, an idiot bereft of even elementary ability to face up to the reality.
					
					 From the outset of the year Hong is making his last-ditch efforts to divert elsewhere the south Korean public bitter criticism of the puppet regime and escape its miserable fate already sealed through outbursts inciting confrontation. But this is as foolish as a dog barking at the moon.

articles.title: S. Korean Online Paper Slams Park Geun Hye's Foolish Remarks
articles.content:
S. Korean Online Paper Slams Park Geun Hye's Foolish Remarks
 Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- The south Korean online paper Voice of People on Jan. 26 in an editorial denounced the silly remarks of traitor Park Geun Hye denying her crimes.
					 The editorial said Park at a recent press conference with conservative media persons claimed she could not remove the suspicion that the current crisis was planned from long ago and it was by no means accidental.
					
					 Through the press conference Park's idea of confrontation was revealed, the editorial said, adding that Park's utterances only disclosed her intention to stay in "presidency" by dividing the people.

articles.title: Disbandment of Ministry of Planning and Finance Demanded by S. Korean Body
articles.content:
Disbandment of Ministry of Planning and Finance Demanded by S. Korean Body
 Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- The Trade Union of Public Transport and Service of south Korea called for the disbandment of the puppet Ministry of Planning and Finance at a press conference held in Seoul on Jan. 24, according to south Korean internet paper Chamsesang.
					 Speakers said at the press conference that the introduction of the system of paying wages according to piece rate in the public service only brought business groups profits.
					
					 Branding the ministry as "ministry of planning for plutocrats", they declared that they would launch actions for disbanding the Ministry of Planning and Finance from now.

articles.title: Federation of Young Korean Nationals in China to Turn out in Patriotic Movement for Reunification
articles.content:
Federation of Young Korean Nationals in China Vows to Turn out in Patriotic Movement for Reunification
 Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Zhongnan Regional Association of the Federation of Young Korean Nationals in China made public a statement on Jan. 22 in hearty response to the New Year Address made by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					 We received an appeal of the motherland to all Koreans to turn out in the great nationwide march for reunification, the statement noted, adding:
					
					 Reunification can not be achieved by others but it is the duty of the Korean nation as it should be achieved by the concerted efforts of the Koreans and it is the only way of saving the Koreans to wage a patriotic struggle for reunification.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced in Poland
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Introduced in Poland
 Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's work "On Strengthening the People's Army and Creating a Social Climate in Which Prominence Is Given to Military Affairs" was posted by the Polish Branch of the Korean Friendship Association on its website and on the Polish website "The DPRK" on Jan. 23.
					 The work published on Feb. 4, Juche 81 (1992) deals with the issue of holding a large-scale military parade to celebrate the 60th founding anniversary of the Korean People's Army in the presence of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 It also indicates the tasks for strengthening the People's Army and creating a social climate in which priority is given to military affairs.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Belarus
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birth Anniversary to Be Marked in Belarus
 Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- A preparatory committee for celebrating the 75th birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il was formed in Belarus on Jan. 9.
					 L. Shukolinikov, chairman of the Permanent Standing Committee of the Belarus National Association of Friends of Korean People Named after Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to give wide publicity to Kim Jong Il's revolutionary career and exploits and organize such colorful political and cultural events as meeting and lecture on this anniversary.

articles.title: Day of Sun, Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Bangladesh
articles.content:
Day of Sun, Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Bangladesh
 Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- A Bangladeshi preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Sun and the Day of the Shining Star, birth anniversaries of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, was formed on Jan. 23.
					 MD. Harun-Ar-Rashid, chairman of the Bangladeshi Preparatory Committee for the 2017 Meeting Praising Great Persons of Mt Paektu and chairman of the Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold such political and cultural events as meeting, seminar, film show and photo exhibition praising the revolutionary careers and exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and the greatness of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un on these anniversaries.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Bulgaria
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star to Be Marked in Bulgaria
 Pyongyang, January 29 (KCNA) -- A Bulgarian preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Shining Star (birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il) was formed in Sofia on Jan. 16.
					 Vladimir Topencharov, member of the National Council of the Bulgarian Socialist Party and chairman of the War Veterans Movement, was elected chairman of the preparatory committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold political and cultural events such as meeting and film show praising the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star.
